summary: I WENT TO YOUR WEB SITE TO CHECK OUT ALL RECALLS ON MY 1995 CHEV. S10, I BEEN HAVING PROBLEMS WITH MY WINDSHIELD WIPER/WASHER FOR ABOUT A COUPLE OF YEARS AND NEVER RECIEVED A RECALL ON THIS PROBLEM SO I CONTACTED CHEVROLET ABOUT THIS PROBLEM AND THEY REFUSE TO FIX THIS PLOBLEM ON MY 95 S10.
